title: Resolute
description: resist, resume, withstand, repel, endure, forgo

data.desc:
There is no value for belief in a dying world, nothing beyond here and now.
Whim ridden, you drown in the joyous decadence of the moment.

Your view holds the entire horizon, your focus on the eternal.
Even in the greatest of storms, your gaze will not sway.
